title: Canoo To Build Battery Manufacturing Facility In Oklahoma
dc:creator: Retail Asia
description:
read the original version on: www.retailnews.asia

Electric vehicle startup Canoo Inc said on Wednesday it would build a battery manufacturing facility at Pryor in Oklahoma with a capacity of 3,200 Megawatt hours production. The company’s Pryor facility will make proprietary battery modules, energy management system and thermal control technology, CEO and Chairman Tony Aquila said. Canoo added it will be the first electric vehicle […]
